Everyone hopes to land somewhere helpful for them or collect cards that aids them in an easier service, and of course trying to avoid the officers who are ready to hand out penalties!
So that in the end they 'll serve fewer days than others having the least penalties.

Contents:

1 Game board
54 Cards (18 for 3 sets)
1 Block for penalties
6 Playing pieces
2 Dice

Name: Summoner Wars: Cloaks Faction Deck
Description:
From the publisher:

They are the Cloaks - a nation of the discarded victims of the vile Bender Empire that rules the continent of Far Esta. Forced to live in hiding they have mastered the art of guerrilla warfare. They come in the night landing harsh blows against their foes, only to melt back into the darkness from whence they came. Gunners take out sentries with well-aimed shots, and Scrappers waylay unsuspecting soldiers. And only when the fight is over do their enemies realize they have been looted by Thieves.

Heading this force is Vlox, former apprentice to old Leonardo, the dead genius who created their black powder weaponry. Vlox is the ultimate jack of all trades, and he intends to use his new Summoning Stone to carve a bloody path through the heart of the Bender Empire.

Contents: 35 cards (1 complete faction deck)

Cloaks Faction Deck Includes: 
1 Vlox- Summoner
1 Dagger - Champion
1 Violet - Champion
1 Scam - Champion
7 Scrapper - Common
7 Gunner - Common
4 Thief - Common
2 Assassinate Events
2 Cloak of Shadows Events
2 Magic Drain Events
2 Raid Events
1 Spy Event
3 Wall Cards 
1 Summoner Reference Card

Name: Summoner Wars: Jungle Elves Faction Deck
Description:
From the publisher:

Drums echo ominously through the jungles, and savage beasts roar at the prospect of the feast to come. Shadows flit through the trees as the Jungle Elves prepare for war. An age has passed since last they were seen, but soon all of Itharia will recall that the Phoenix Elves do not stand alone for all of elfkind. Trained lions move through the greenery, the strongest bearing warriors upon their backs. Those who might spy this secret muster will find themselves riddled with arrows, courtesy of elite archers. And there are those who say even the trees themselves have come alive to join the coming battle.

At the head of this army is Abua Shi, a powerful Summoner whose Summoning Stone was earned through betrayal and lies. He is driven by a secret shame, one that can only be set right through the act of violent revenge.

Contents: 35 cards (1 complete faction deck)

Jungle Elves Faction Deck Includes: 
1 Abua Shi - Summoner
1 Miti Mumway - Champion
1 Makeinda Ru - Champion
1 Shikwa - Champion
8 Lioness - Common
6 Archer - Common
4 Lioneer - Common
2 Chant of Deception Events
2 Chant of Haste Events
2 Chant of Life Events
2 Chant of Negation Events
1 Chant of Salvation Event
3 Wall Cards 
1 Summoner Reference Card

Name: Call of Cthulhu: The Card Game – Aspirations of Ascension Asylum Pack
Description:
Aspirations of Ascension is the fourth Asylum Pack in the Rituals of the Order cycle for Call of Cthulhu: The Card Game. Lucy is able to complete her assignment, but in the process, she learns some forbidden knowledge and is captured.

Aspirations of Ascension is a fixed 60 card Asylum Pack that contains 20 different never-before-seen cards based on the dark mythos of master horror writer H.P. Lovecraft, designed to augment existing decks and add variety to the Call of Cthulhu metagame.

This is not a stand-alone deck; you must have additional Call of Cthulhu LCG cards to play.
Families: Collectible: Living Card Game (Fantasy Flight Games)
Game: Call of Cthulhu – The Card Game (Fantasy Flight Games)

Name: Pyramid Game
Description: Simple roll and move around a plastic pyramid. On the top of the pyramid there is a big gem. Thise gem will be spinned and shows different numbers (works as a die). There are also mummies hindering the players to reach the top. First player to reach the top on his colored stairs wins.

Name: Resolution?
Description:
From Box back:
Resolution? is the entertaining and enlightening game that makes child's play out of the current Savings & Loan crisis. As you play, you'll read quotes, facts and some amazing statistics on the biggest financial scandal of the century, and how we're all going to pay for it! It's a must for every taxpayer -- and future Taxpayer -- in America.

Name: Schlag den Raab: Speed Puzzle
Description:
Who will be the fastest?

Two puzzles with the same picture and the same size (81 pieces) and six actioncards will guarantee a nice and funny competition.

The actioncards are optional and give different options solving the puzzle.

1. start with the outer parts of the puzzle (Frame)
2. solve the puzzle upside down  
3. start with the round piece in the middle and build around
4. finish with the round piece in the middle
5. be the first - however
6. start with the lower row and build upwards

Name: Platz da für Kli-Kla-Klawitter
Description: Each player get a family with 3 members (A,B and C) and tries to place them in the right order on a 8x8 grid in on row. On the grid there are number from 1 to 6. On your turn you roll a die and place on piece on a spot with that number. You can place one of your family members (only in one row) or a neutral (blocking) piece somewhere. Whoever has first his members in the right order in the grid wins.

Name: Атака (Attack)
Description:
Tanks, infantry and aviation are waiting for your orders. Attack, defend and destroy hostile forces and take their headquarter to score even more points!

Before starting your game you have to prepare your forces (miniatures consist of several parts)

---

After placing armies along opposite sides of hexagonal gameboard, players start to alternate their turns. Each turn they have 8 Action Points, where each 1 allows to give orders for 1 unit. HQ cannot move. Every air unit must move each turn if not landed.

Tables used to describe terrain movement costs, units range and movement, and their firepower (type vs type). d6 used to determine damage. Some units hit several hexes at once.

One has to get 16 Victory Points to win. Destroy a unit to earn 1 VP. Destroy HQ to earn 3 VPs. Capture HQ to get 6 VPs at once.

Name: Kynstrin öll
Description:
From the publisher: Kynstrin öll is a fun and different trivia game with interesting and funny questions. The game will start rowdy discussions between players on just about everything concerning the interaction between males and females and sexual issues. Interesting information about issues anyone should know is dispersed all through the game. This game is the first one of it's kind in Iceland.

Players roll a die which indicates from which of the five categories their next question will be. The goal is to be the first to answer correctly a question from all of the five categories.
